mapper.select: SELECT p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.price, p.rating, p.baumann_id, b.type AS baumann_type FROM product p JOIN baumann b ON p.baumann_id = b.baumann_id WHERE p.prd_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR p.prd_brand LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR p.ingredient LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR b.type LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
